ClassInfo.author: JEAF Development Team
ClassInfo.description: Class contains all generated constants for messages of JEAF that are used by JEAF Tools

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new instance of class ''{0}'' using Class.newInstance().
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new instance of a class could not be created using Class.newInstance().
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_NEW_INSTANCE

Message.defaultText: Locale string '{0}' does neither define a language nor country.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a locale string does neither define a language nor country.
Message.name: LANGUAGE_OR_COUNTRY_MISSING

Message.defaultText: Locale string '{0}' does not have the format 'language_country_variant'.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a locale string does have the required format.
Message.name: INVALID_LOCALE_STRING_FORMAT

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new instance of class ''{0}''. The object is not assignable to type ''{1}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a class that should be created by reflection is not assignable to a specific type.
Message.name: CLASS_NOT_ASSIGNABLE

Message.defaultText: ''{0}'' is not an official http status code.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if an invalid http status code is used.
Message.name: INVALID_HTTP_STATUS_CODE

Message.defaultText: Unable to lookup information about website ''{0}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if lookup for an website fails.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_LOOKUP_WEBSITE_INFORMATION

Message.defaultText: The value of property ''{0}'' does not match the pattern date pattern ''{1}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if an invalid value date format is used.
Message.name: INVALID_DATE_FORMAT

Message.defaultText: Unable to serialize object of class ''{0}''. For further details see nested exception.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if an IOException occurs during the serialization of an object.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_SERIALIZE_OBJECT

Message.defaultText: Unable to deserialize object of class ''{0}''. For further details see nested exception.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if an IOException occurs during the deserialization of an object.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_DESERIALIZE_OBJECT

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new SecureTokenGenerator. The passed algorithm ''{0}'' is unknown..
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if an unknow algorithm is passed to JEAFs secure token generator.
Message.name: UNKNOWN_ALGORITHM

Message.defaultText: ErrorDuringSerialization: Object could not be serialized due to an unexpected Error.
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that the Serialization failed because of an IOException.
Message.name: ERROR_DURING_SERIALIZATION

Message.defaultText: ErrorDuringDeSerialization: Object could not be deserialized due to an unexpected Error.
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that the Deserialization failed because of an IOException.
Message.name: ERROR_DURING_DESERIALIZATION

Message.defaultText: ErrorDuringDeSerializationClassNotFound: Object could not be deserialized due to an Class not found Error.
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that the Deserialization failed because of an ClassNotFoundException.
Message.name: ERROR_DURING_DESERIALIZATION_CLASS_NOT_FOUND

Message.defaultText: Unable to resolve networking information due to an I/O exception. Details: {0}
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that the Serialization failed because of an I/O exception.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_RESOLVE_NETWORK_INFO

Message.defaultText: Unable to resolve host address for ''{0}''. Details: {1}
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that host name could not be resolved.
Message.name: UNKNOWN_HOST

Message.defaultText: Network error when trying to reach host ''{0}''. Details: {1}
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that host name could be reached due to an network error.
Message.name: NETWORK_ERROR_ON_PING

Message.defaultText: ''{0}'' is not a valid URL.
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that a URL,is not valid.
Message.name: INVALID_URL

Message.defaultText: Unable to write XML to stream. Details: {0}
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that an xml document could not be written to stream.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_WRITE_XML

Message.defaultText: Could not find required element ''{0}'' in passed subtree.
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that a required xml element could not be find within a specific subtree.
Message.name: REQUIRED_ELEMENT_NOT_FOUND

Message.defaultText: The element with the name ''{0}'' occurs more than once.
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that a single element occurs more than one within a specific subtree.
Message.name: ELEMENT_NOT_UNIQUE

Message.defaultText: String ''{0}'' does not match to the required timestamp format ''{1}''.
Message.description: Error code is used to when an invalid timestamp format is used.
Message.name: INVALID_TIMESTAMP_FORMAT

Message.defaultText: Could not find required attribute ''{0}'' on element ''{1}}''.
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that a required xml element could not be find within a specific subtree.
Message.name: REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUND

Message.defaultText: Unable to parse XML resource ''{0}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if during parsing an XML resource an exception occurs.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_PARSE_XML_FILE

Message.defaultText: Unable to claim new document builder from pool. Please adjust pool size. Current pool with {0} entries seems to be to small.
Message.description: Exceptions occurs if all document builders from pool are already in use.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CLAIM_POOLED_DOCUMENT_BUILDER

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new document builder.
Message.description: Exceptions occurs if a new document builders could not be created.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_DOCUMENT_BUILDER

Message.defaultText: XML-Element ''{0}'' does not have a node value even though its required.
Message.description: Exceptions occurs if an element is expected to have a node value but does not.
Message.name: ELEMENT_VALUE_MISSING

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new SSL Socket Factory. Details: {0}
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate that a new SSL Socket Factory could ot be created.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_SSL_SOCKET_FACTORY

Message.defaultText: Unable to delete file or directory ''{0}'' from disk.
Message.description: Messages with this message id are traced if an exception occurs when trying to load a locale provider.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_DELETE_FILE

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new file ''{0}''. The file already exists.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error are thrown when a new file could not be created.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_NEW_FILE

Message.defaultText: Transfered content of file ''{0}'' in {1}ms (Size: {2} / Transfer rate: {3} MB/s).
Message.description: Messages with this message id are traced after a file was copied.
Message.name: TRANSFERED_FILE_CONTENT

Message.defaultText: Extracted file ''{0}'' in {1}ms (Size: {2} / Extraction rate: {3} MB/s).
Message.description: Messages with this message id are traced after a zip file was extracted.
Message.name: EXTRACTED_FILE

Message.defaultText: Unable to access file attributes of filesystem element ''{0}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error when an IOException occurs during access on file attributes via NIO.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_ACCESS_FILE_ATTRIBUTES

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new directory ''{0}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error when a new directory could not be created.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_DIRECTORY

Message.defaultText: Passed extension ''{0}'' is invalid. Valid extensions have to consist of at least one real character in addtion to perfix that looks as follows: ''*'' or ''.''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error when a new directory could not be created.
Message.name: INVALID_EXTENSION

Message.defaultText: Passed file object ''{0}'' either does not exist or it does not point to a directory.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error are thrown when a passed file object does not point to a directory.
Message.name: NOT_A_DIRECTORY

Message.defaultText: IOException occurred when trying to resolve canonical path of file ''{0}''. {1}
Message.description: Exceptions with this error are thrown when a passed file object does not point to a directory.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_CANONICAL_PATH

Message.defaultText: Maximum amount of bytes that should be transfered from input to output stream was exceeded (Limit: {0} bytes).
Message.description: Exceptions with this error are thrown when the maximum amount of bytes that is allowed to be transfered is exceeded.
Message.name: MAX_BYTES_EXCEEDED

Message.defaultText: Extraction of zip archive ''{0}'' was aborted. The extracted file(s) took more disk space than allowed (Limit: {1} bytes)
Message.description: Exceptions with this error are thrown when the maximum amount of bytes that is allowed to be transfered is exceeded.
Message.name: ZIP_EXTRACTION_ABORTED

Message.defaultText: Extraction of zip archive ''{0}'' was aborted. A directory traversal attack was detected by ZIP entry ''{1}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error are thrown when a directory traversal attack was detected.
Message.name: PREVENTED_DIRECTORY_TRAVERSAL_ATTACK

Message.defaultText: Unable to calculate size of directory ''{0}'' failed. Path does not point to an existing directory. Please also ensure that current user is allowed to access the directory.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error are thrown when size of a not exiusting directory should be calculated..
Message.name: CALCULATION_OF_DIR_SIZE_FAILED

Message.defaultText: {0} request validation(s) failed. Please check specific messages for further details.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if constraint checks for the parameters of a request fail.
Message.name: REQUEST_VALIDATION_FAILED

Message.defaultText: {0} response validation(s) failed. Please check specific messages for further details.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if constraint checks for the response of a request fails.
Message.name: RESPONSE_VALIDATION_FAILED

Message.defaultText: Unable to encrypt the given text, due to configuration problems in the encryption module.
Message.description: Messages with this message id are traced if an exception occurs when trying to encrypt a string.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_ENCRYPT_STRING

Message.defaultText: Unable to decrypt the given text, due to configuration problems in the decryption.
Message.description: Messages with this message id are traced if an exception occurs when trying to decrypt a string.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_DECRYPT_STRING

Message.defaultText: SECURITY WARNING: Your client is configured to also accept invalid SSL certificates. This is a high security risk!
Message.description: Security warning if all SSL certificates are accpeted.
Message.name: SSL_WARNING

Message.defaultText: Unable to verify the signature against the provided public key.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_VERIFY_SIGNATURE

Message.defaultText: Unable to generate new key pair for encryption.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_KEY_PAIR

Message.defaultText: Unable to generate public or private key from bytes.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_KEY_FROM_BYTES

Message.defaultText: Unable to encrypt the passed content with RSA. Content size is {0} bytes. Max. message size for the passed public key is only {1} bytes.
Message.name: RSA_MAX_MESSAGE_SIZE_EXCEEDED

Message.defaultText: Unable to create AES secret key.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_AES_SECRET_KEY

Message.defaultText: Unable to sign message.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_SIGN_MESSAGE

Message.defaultText: Secure tokens need to have a length of at least one character.
Message.name: INVALID_TOKEN_LENGTH

Message.defaultText: Algorithm ''{0}'' is not supported. This looks like a configuration issue. Please check your configuration.
Message.name: UNSUPPORTED_ALGORITHM

Message.defaultText: Name for meter is not JMX compatible. Please rename your meter in order to fulfill requirements of JMX. Generated JMX object name was ''{0}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if constraint checks for the parameters of a request fail.
Message.name: INVALID_JMX_METER_NAME

Message.defaultText: '{0}'' is neither a valid ISO 3166 alpha-2 nor alpha-3 coutry code.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown in case that invalid ISO 3166 alpha-2 or alpha-3 country code is used.
Message.name: INVALID_COUNTRY_CODE

Message.defaultText: Object validation failed. For further details please check constraint violation message(s).
Message.description: Excetions with this error code are thrown in case that at least one constraint violation for an object failed.
Message.name: OBJECT_VALIDATION_FAILED

Message.defaultText: Unable to acquire obvject of the requested type from pool ''{0}''. Pool is either completely occupied or could not be increased that fast. Please check error logs for further information about pool.
Message.description: Error code is used in case that an object could not be acquired from the pool.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_ACQUIRE_OBJECT_FROM_POOL

Message.defaultText: Increased size of pool ''{0}'' from {1} to {2} objects.
Message.description: Message is used in case that the size of a pool is increased.
Message.name: INCREASED_POOL_SIZE

Message.defaultText: Unable to increase size of pool '' {0}''. Pool already has ist maximum size of {1} objects.
Message.description: Message is used in case that a pool already has it's maximum size and more objects are requested.
Message.name: POOL_OVERLOADED

Message.defaultText: Unable to create new instance of tools implementation ''{0}''. See nested exception for further details.
Message.description: Message with this error code are used in case that a new instance of a JEAF Tools implementation could not be created.
Message.name: UNABLE_TO_CREATE_TOOLS_IMPLEMENTATION

Message.defaultText: No tools implementation found for interface ''{0}''.
Message.description: Error code is used in case that a requested tools implementation is not available.
Message.name: TOOLS_IMPLEMENTATION_NOT_AVAILABLE

Message.defaultText: Ignoring tools implementation ''{0}'' for tools interface ''{1}''. Using implementation ''[3}'' instead as it has higher priority.
Message.description: This message is used in case that another tools implementation is already is already used and another one for the same interface is also provided.
Message.name: IGNORING_TOOLS_IMPLEMENTATION
